component.name: Mojave-GTK
component.summary: Mojave-Style Theme for GTK Flatpak Applications

description.p: This Flatpak provides a copy of Vince Liuice's Mojave-style GTK theme in a form that can be used by Flatpak applications. NOTE: this theme is a supplement to the main theme and cannot be enabled on its own. In order to apply this theme to your Flatpak applications, you will need to install the main (non-Flatpak) theme from Vince Liuice's GitHub (linked below) and enable it in GNOME Tweaks. In addition to this Flatpak theme, the following components are currently available:

ul.li: A Snap version of this theme (for Snap applications)
A Firefox theme (in the cross-platform installer)
Themes for both Dash-to-Dock and Plank

description.p: Please visit Vince Liuice's GitHub (linked below) for information on the other available components, as well as the editable source code.
